document_data.name: Rensha family
document_data.symbol: A red moon against a field of gold
document_data.mainbody: The '''Renshas''' were a [[Calishite]] family that conquered [[Loudwater]] and much of the [[Delimbiyr Vale]], ruling it from the midâ€“12{{th}} to early 14{{th}} centuries [[DR]].{{cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/What is the Green Regent}}

History.Legacy:
Being rather secretive, the Rensha lords left few records of their works.

The [[High Lord's Hall]] in Loudwater was built by the Rensha family during their rule. This walled manor displayed an odd mixture of southern Calishite and elven styles.

document_data.Symbol: The family crest was a single red moon against a field of gold.
document_data.Legends: Rumors told in Loudwater, such as by warehouse owner [[Agrath Dundai]] to [[Volothamp Geddarm]] sometime before [[1366 DR]], claimed there was a crypt beneath High Lord's Hall haunted by [[undead]], namely the remnants of former Rensha High Lords of Loudwater, and that some of them had experimented with dark [[magic]]. This was all completely correct.
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Ibun Rensha]]: First Rensha lord of Loudwater.
* [[Misbah Rensha]]: Second Rensha lord of Loudwater and a diabolist.
* [[Marzut Rensha]]: Fifth Rensha lord of Loudwater and an alienist.
* [[Pasuuk Rensha]]: Final Rensha lord of Loudwater.
* [[Paronthen Rensha]]: An emissary to the Zhentarim of [[Llorkh]].
* [[Sanaja Rensha]]: A [[wizard]] working with the Zhentarim.
